page.title: 14ROSE QUEEN FESTIVAL
page.content: In 1959 the first Rose Queen Festival was held.The Vicar Rev.Watkinson and two other ladies organised it.The Queen and attendants come from the village school.The first Queen was Isobel Day and the crowning ceremony was held on the vicarage lawn.It was held there until 1980 when the Queen that year was crowned for the first time in church because of bad weather. The ceremony is now held on the school lawn.It starts with a procession of the retiring Queen,the present queen and visiting queens from nearby villages.Usually a band leads the procession.The fete is opened by a local person.The retiring queen crowns the new queen.She makes a short speech and is presented with an engraved Rose Bowl.Competitions take place and games and stalls provide the entertainment.
